DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine way soy consumption affect menopausal symptom middle-aged Japanese woman .
DOC.detailed_description: For past 20 year , Japanese woman report few menopausal symptom North American counterpart . One explanation disparity difference diet . Evidence suggest Japanese woman consume large amount soy , phytoestrogen structurally similar hormone estrogen . However , lack menopause-related research data non-Western population . This study long-term observation effect soy consumption menopausal Japanese woman . This study last 6 month . Participants complete dietary log menopausal symptom checklist daily . There three four study visit . During visit , participant complete diet questionnaire , blood sample collect , interview menopausal symptom . Six month study completion , participant send questionnaire recent menopausal symptom may experience .
